page.title: 14CHICHESTER GALA.
page.content: {Chichester Gala}is a celebration where {Cicestrians} get together, enjoy themselves and raise money for local charities. It began in 1955 inspired by{Mr.Leslie Evershed-Martin}and has continued for 30 years. It has as its emblem the cornflower. These are sold in the streets on{Gala Day.The Gala}is a week of activities culminating in Gala Day, always the 1st Saturday in July.There are activities for all ages in Priory Park and elsewhere in the city.An evening procession through the streets is presided over by the {Gala {Queen.}Money raised is administered by the{Chichester Combined Charities.Gala {85}sees a change, with the activities continuing on Sunday-a Gala Weekend. The tradition of the Gala is still strong and on Gala Day a lively, warm atmosphere prevails in the city & in Priory Park the main venue for events.
